name: Meteoric Eagle
description: In the ancient Era Creatura, Aquila, after forging the Dawn Device, collaborated with Kephale to bring forth the legendary beasts embodying the Titans. It is whispered that the Meteoric Eagle is a symbol of Aquila's celestial feathers that occasionally fall to the mortal realm.

skills.name: Pierce the Night Sky
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to one designated target.

skills.name: Shine Like Meteors
skills.description: Applies 1 stack of <u>"Stormride"</u> to one designated friendly unit. Units in the <u>"Stormride"</u> state will immediately take action at the end of their turn.
